title: Lara Croft: Relic Run v1.7.83 MOD apk + data
description:

This is the all new action adventure for nostalgic Lara Croft fans.

When a shadowy conspiracy threatens the world, only Lara Croft is equipped to unearth the truth. Run, swing, drive, and swan dive your way through beautiful and challenging environments, uncovering ancient relics to discover the truth and solve the mystery.

What's new:
It's Christmas, so we've put a new update for Lara Croft Relic Run in your stocking. Get unwrapping & updating to enjoy:

Keep hunting for those relics & remember that every mountain top is in reach if you just keep climbing!

Install APK,Place data folder in SDCard/Android/Obb/ and play.
